plays.text: Goal scored by Mark Parrish assisted by Michael Peca and Roman Hamrlik

Goal scored by Mariusz Czerkawski assisted by Mark Parrish and Roman Hamrlik
Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
